sqlMap.select: select II_ID, II_FILL_DATE, II_APPLY_POSITION, II_EXPECTED_SALARY, II_NAME, II_SEX, II_NATIONALITY, II_ID_NO, II_BIRTHDAY, II_NATION, II_NATIVE_PLACE, II_PHOTO, II_POLITICAL_STATUS, II_MARITAL_STATUS, II_HAVE_CHILDREN_STATUS, II_PHONE, II_EMAIL, II_PRESENT_ADDRESS, II_POSTALCODE, II_HOBBY, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PLACE, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PERMIT, II_HAVE_CRIME, II_HAVE_DRUG, II_REMARK, CUI_ID, II_CREATEUSER, II_CREATETIME, II_MODIFYUSER, II_MODIFYTIME, II_EXT1, II_EXT2, II_EXT3 from B_INTEGRITY_INFO where II_ID = #iiId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, c.* from ( select II_ID, II_FILL_DATE, II_APPLY_POSITION, II_EXPECTED_SALARY, II_NAME, II_SEX, II_NATIONALITY, II_ID_NO, II_BIRTHDAY, II_NATION, II_NATIVE_PLACE, II_PHOTO, II_POLITICAL_STATUS, II_MARITAL_STATUS, II_HAVE_CHILDREN_STATUS, II_PHONE, II_EMAIL, II_PRESENT_ADDRESS, II_POSTALCODE, II_HOBBY, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PLACE, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PERMIT, II_HAVE_CRIME, II_HAVE_DRUG, II_REMARK, CUI_ID, II_CREATEUSER, II_CREATETIME, II_MODIFYUSER, II_MODIFYTIME, II_EXT1, II_EXT2, II_EXT3 from B_INTEGRITY_INFO ) c) WHERE NUMROW >= $ibegin$ AND NUMROW < $iend$

SELECT count(1) as ID from ( select II_ID, II_FILL_DATE, II_APPLY_POSITION, II_EXPECTED_SALARY, II_NAME, II_SEX, II_NATIONALITY, II_ID_NO, II_BIRTHDAY, II_NATION, II_NATIVE_PLACE, II_PHOTO, II_POLITICAL_STATUS, II_MARITAL_STATUS, II_HAVE_CHILDREN_STATUS, II_PHONE, II_EMAIL, II_PRESENT_ADDRESS, II_POSTALCODE, II_HOBBY, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PLACE, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PERMIT, II_HAVE_CRIME, II_HAVE_DRUG, II_REMARK, CUI_ID, II_CREATEUSER, II_CREATETIME, II_MODIFYUSER, II_MODIFYTIME, II_EXT1, II_EXT2, II_EXT3 from B_INTEGRITY_INFO )
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_B_INTEGRITY_INFO.NEXTVAL AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into B_INTEGRITY_INFO (II_ID, II_FILL_DATE, II_APPLY_POSITION, II_EXPECTED_SALARY, II_NAME, II_SEX, II_NATIONALITY, II_ID_NO, II_BIRTHDAY, II_NATION, II_NATIVE_PLACE, II_PHOTO, II_POLITICAL_STATUS, II_MARITAL_STATUS, II_HAVE_CHILDREN_STATUS, II_PHONE, II_EMAIL, II_PRESENT_ADDRESS, II_POSTALCODE, II_HOBBY, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PLACE, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PERMIT, II_HAVE_CRIME, II_HAVE_DRUG, II_REMARK, CUI_ID, II_CREATEUSER, II_CREATETIME, II_MODIFYUSER, II_MODIFYTIME, II_EXT1, II_EXT2, II_EXT3) values (#iiId#, #iiFillDate#, #iiApplyPosition#, #iiExpectedSalary#, #iiName#, #iiSex#, #iiNationality#, #iiIdNo#, #iiBirthday#, #iiNation#, #iiNativePlace#, #iiPhoto#, #iiPoliticalStatus#, #iiMaritalStatus#, #iiHaveChildrenStatus#, #iiPhone#, #iiEmail#, #iiPresentAddress#, #iiPostalcode#, #iiHobby#, #iiDriveQualificationPlace#, #iiDriveQualificationPermit#, #iiHaveCrime#, #iiHaveDrug#, #iiRemark#, #cuiId#, #iiCreateuser#, #iiCreatetime#, #iiModifyuser#, #iiModifytime#, #iiExt1#, #iiExt2#, #iiExt3#)
sqlMap.update: update B_INTEGRITY_INFO set II_FILL_DATE = #iiFillDate#, II_APPLY_POSITION = #iiApplyPosition#, II_EXPECTED_SALARY = #iiExpectedSalary#, II_NAME = #iiName#, II_SEX = #iiSex#, II_NATIONALITY = #iiNationality#, II_ID_NO = #iiIdNo#, II_BIRTHDAY = #iiBirthday#, II_NATION = #iiNation#, II_NATIVE_PLACE = #iiNativePlace#, II_PHOTO = #iiPhoto#, II_POLITICAL_STATUS = #iiPoliticalStatus#, II_MARITAL_STATUS = #iiMaritalStatus#, II_HAVE_CHILDREN_STATUS = #iiHaveChildrenStatus#, II_PHONE = #iiPhone#, II_EMAIL = #iiEmail#, II_PRESENT_ADDRESS = #iiPresentAddress#, II_POSTALCODE = #iiPostalcode#, II_HOBBY = #iiHobby#, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PLACE = #iiDriveQualificationPlace#, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PERMIT = #iiDriveQualificationPermit#, II_HAVE_CRIME = #iiHaveCrime#, II_HAVE_DRUG = #iiHaveDrug#, II_REMARK = #iiRemark#, CUI_ID = #cuiId#, II_CREATEUSER = #iiCreateuser#, II_CREATETIME = #iiCreatetime#, II_MODIFYUSER = #iiModifyuser#, II_MODIFYTIME = #iiModifytime#, II_EXT1 = #iiExt1#, II_EXT2 = #iiExt2#, II_EXT3 = #iiExt3# where II_ID = #iiId#
sqlMap.select:
select II_ID, II_FILL_DATE, II_APPLY_POSITION, II_EXPECTED_SALARY, II_NAME, II_SEX, II_NATIONALITY, II_ID_NO, II_BIRTHDAY, II_NATION, II_NATIVE_PLACE, II_PHOTO, II_POLITICAL_STATUS, II_MARITAL_STATUS, II_HAVE_CHILDREN_STATUS, II_PHONE, II_EMAIL, II_PRESENT_ADDRESS, II_POSTALCODE, II_HOBBY, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PLACE, II_DRIVE_QUALIFICATION_PERMIT, II_HAVE_CRIME, II_HAVE_DRUG, II_REMARK, CUI_ID, II_CREATEUSER, II_CREATETIME, II_MODIFYUSER, II_MODIFYTIME, II_EXT1, II_EXT2, II_EXT3 from B_INTEGRITY_INFO where 1=1
CUI_ID = #cuiId#
